content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” css=”.vc_custom_1515778638433{background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1499606795189{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1515777663831{padding-top: 120px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 120px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2018/01/confetti_process_no_01a_b.jpg?id=11351) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1600068371663{padding-left: 5% !important;}”]

Easy WordPress website maintenance

Have you made an update to your website and now it all looks ‘funny’?

Our wordpress website support services packages can be used for any kind of problem you encounter or issue you need fixed!

We offer a range of maintenance services that help your website perform more effectively, including:

  • Installing forms or pop-ups and linking to your mailing list provider (e.g. Mailchimp) to help you market directly with prospects and customer
  • Linking Stripe / Paypal / After Pay account so you can sell your services and products
  • Installing and testing plugins such as a Back-Up plugin so you have a copy of your website files in case of emergency or hacking.
  • Installing and configuring a security service such as Sucuri. This firewall and malware service will minimise security breaches and get you back up and running.
  • Helping you move your website files from your old host to a new host
  • Adding a new service page to your website or a blog

If you need WordPress support, we can help!

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][vc_column_text] Packages start at $66 ph [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1517650200752{background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2018/01/confetti_process_no_01a_a.jpg?id=11352) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”400px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1515778645622{background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”imgtxt-mobvw”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1499606801272{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” el_class=”imgtxt-mobvw2″][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1515777850116{background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2018/01/confetti_process_no_02-1_a.jpg?id=11354) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”400px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1515777864456{padding-top: 120px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 120px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2018/01/confetti_process_no_02-1_b.jpg?id=11355) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1563879482294{padding-right: 5% !important;}”]

Graphic design

Need a flyer or powerpoint presentation designed?

We have a fabulous graphic designer who creates all our brand identities. We also design product packaging, flyers, slide decks, letter heads, book covers.. the list goes on. Essentially if you need a design we can do it!

We can also make updates to existing files. Including; changing raw design files of your logo, updating details on a business card, changing colours on your logo or marketing, creating a graphic to use on your website, correctly sized social media banners.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][vc_column_text] Packages start at $120 ph [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” css=”.vc_custom_1515778652781{background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1499606807414{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1515777919083{padding-top: 120px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 120px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2018/01/confetti_process_no_03b_b.jpg?id=11357) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1517650483960{padding-left: 5% !important;}”]

Organic SEO

No idea what it is but know you need it to get ranked on Google?

We can offer a range of SEO services to help you improve your ranking on Google. The main on includes completing the SEO Yoast plugin in the back end of your website. In it’s simplest form, it helps with your visibility, meaning how high up the search engine results pages your website appears for certain search terms in the ‘organic’ results. Organic results refer to those that appear naturally on the page, rather than in the paid-for sections (those that have a little green AD) The SEO Yoast plugins is one vital way to making this happen. You can add this service onto your regular wordpress website support services.

Our service includes:

  • On-page SEO – up to 5 pages:
  • SEO-friendly URLS (correct syntax and keyword use)
  • Keyword placement (including LSI keyword use) + Image optimisation (‘Alt’ image tags used correctly) + Correct header tag use (good keyword placement & correct syntax) + Meta data – optimised title & description tags for each page

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][vc_column_text]More details – SEO Service [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1515777902690{background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2018/01/confetti_process_no_03b_a.jpg?id=11356) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”400px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” css=”.vc_custom_1515778661737{background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”imgtxt-mobvw”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1499606814045{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” el_class=”imgtxt-mobvw2″][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1515777975021{background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2018/01/confetti_process_no_04-1_a.jpg?id=11358) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”400px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1515777991206{padding-top: 120px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 120px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2018/01/confetti_process_no_04-1_b.jpg?id=11359) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1517650495411{padding-right: 5% !important;}”]

Copywriting

The magic of a website comes from the engaging words.

A lot happens behind the scenes on a website. At the end of the day, our intention is to build sites that are great to look at and easy to navigate. We take care of the design and build but there is another vital piece of the puzzle; words. If you need help supplying compelling and concise copy for each page we can provide an ad-on service to help getting the language right.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][vc_column_text] Sales driven website page copy start at $480 [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” css=”.vc_custom_1515778669683{background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1499606820708{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1515778048087{padding-top: 120px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 120px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2018/01/confetti_process_no_05-2_b.jpg?id=11361) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1563879493212{padding-left: 5% !important;}”]

Images & photography

Hey, I’d like you to meet our great photographer.

Our photographer is the best! And I genuinely mean that. Every one of our clients that have visited Fi Mims Photography has been extremely happy with the images and more than than, have loved the experience (now how many people really do want to have their photo taken?!) Confetti Design will be the Creative Director for the shoot and help with the image plan and outfit selection so every image we need for the website is taken and there is no need to re-shoot.

Link to her HERE[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1515778021958{background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2018/01/confetti_process_no_05-2_a.jpg?id=11360) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”400px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1565066123184{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;background-color: #f4f4f4 !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”confetti-sep gray-bg”][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1499608095407{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”]

Some nice words from happy customers

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner el_class=”testimonial-location”][vc_column_inner css=”.vc_custom_1515777073190{margin-top: 50px !important;margin-bottom: 50px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-left: 10% !important;}”]

Stacey Currie

I had been quoted from $1k to $10k, I had no idea who to trust. Luckily I was referred by someone I trust 100%, who trust Johannah 100%, and I know why. I am very grateful.

Stacey Currie

I still can’t believe my vision is here; I feel extremely proud of my new website and branding. I felt embarrassed of my old branding but now I am so proud to share what Johannah and the team created.

Personal Brand Expert

One feature I loved was Johannah's availability and prompt response to any query no matter how big or small. Confetti's service is always with genuine smile and her positive attitude and outlook made the process fun!

Suzie Lightfoot

Coach Central

I am impressed with how well Johannah nailed my brief without one face-to-face meeting. I highly recommend her to create a website you will love.

Cindy Turner

Wedding Honey

Johannah has produced a beautiful and effective new website for our small business in a short amount of time. Her professionalism, kindness and encouragement is appreciated.

Ray & Sharon Tolcher

Miei Fiori

Johannah took her time to understand our vision before coming back with suggestions that not only meet our requirements but are relevant, current and forward in it's application.

Rob Greca & Lyly Greca

Sarah Trevathan Coach

The process has been stress-free and actually very enjoyable! I'm also delighted with the finished result of my website.

Sarah Trevathan

What's My Style

I regularly receive compliments on my branding, website and the stunning business cards and cannot recommend Johannah and Confetti Designs highly enough.

Nicky McMillan

Four Weeks For You

I was so impressed, not only did Johannah understood my concept but built upon and really thought about it. I was given great ideas and I felt like my concept was achievable.

Catherine Williams

Functional Wellness

I loved Johannah's expertise and approach, she kept encouraging me to think like my customer, I learnt about marketing as well as receiving a great website!

Carolyn Walker

Oh My Golly Gosh

Johannah offered a very personal experience and it was so easy to contact her with any changes as well as questions in regards to operating the admin section of my website as it was being developed. No question or request was too hard and I know throughout the development of the website, Johannah was only a phone call away and always more than happy to assist.

Angela Rampal

Feminine Alignment

I loved most about the process was: Personal service – Johannah’s skill at identifying with each business’ message/branding etc and finding the best outcome for the website as a result. Care – Johannah cares about what she produces and cares about gaining the best possible result for you as an individual/business. Honesty – Johannah is not afraid to speak her mind about what works or doesn’t and does it with grace. Creativity – Johannah’s creative eye ensures that each website she helps to produce looks unique.   Johannah had many resources that I would never have found on my own.

Jody Kalpenos

mukaportraits.com.au

The Clarity process for me was essential. I have always been a planner in my business and I thought I had a really clear concept moving forward, however going through this process made everything so much clearer for me. There is a refinement in the decisions I am now making for the business because of how Johannah's process made me think. I highly recommend anyone in business, no matter what stage you are at, to do the Clarity process before moving forward on anything else. You will save hours of time, and have such a higher level of design more suited to you by doing this.

Sarah Churcher
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
